title: Marketplace Roundtable #7: Value Investing For The 21st Century With Chris DeMuth Jr.
description: Value investing, like any investing style, can get dogmatic. Chris DeMuth Jr., the host of Sifting the World and founder of Rangeley Capital, shares his approach for value investing in the current market and how to find ideas where others aren't looking.
itunes:title: Value Investing For The 21st Century With Chris DeMuth Jr.
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Adjusting classic principles to an ever changing market
itunes:summary: Value investing, like any investing style, can get dogmatic. Chris DeMuth Jr., the host of Sifting the World and founder of Rangeley Capital, shares his approach for value investing in the current market and how to find ideas where others aren't looking.
